title: I’ve Been Reincarnated as a Scumbag, Prickly Best Friend Who Collects Hate in a Gal Game. And the Main Character Is Too Incompetent To Be Useful… - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Supernatural
tags: Absent Parents   Abusive Characters   Academy   Age Progression   Arrogant Characters   Brother Complex   Child Abuse   Childhood Friends   Clumsy Love Interests   Cruel Characters   Dense Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Galge   Handsome Male Lead   Hidden Abilities   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Mind Control   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Perverted Protagonist   Psychic Powers   Reincarnated in a Game World   Siblings   Special Abilities   Time Manipulation   Tragic Past   Unconditional Love
author: Sakura Matsuri   桜祭
description:
The Struggle of a guy who remembers his previous life and realized he reincarnated into the world of a dating sim he used to play.

However, there is one problem with the character he reincarnated as.

The man he reincarnated as was Akechi Hideyori, a man who possesses the ability to manipulate others to [Do whatever he commands at will]. A scumbag who used his ability to ruin the lives of the heroines as the game’s antagonist.

Realizing that I have reincarnated as the a character that was hated by all players, I planned to live out my life without getting involved with the game’s story but……..

Troubles always seem to find their way to me.>
